name: Jeff Cloninger
text: Good, inexpensive bake it yourself pizza. Yes, you can find better pizza in the area, but not at these prices. Better than the chain pizza places.

name: Desirey Aguilar
text: Awesome, Fresh ingredients that I bake at home!!  I like to buy 2 dinners each visit, so my family can enjoy fresh pizza for dinner on busy school nights!

name: Derrick Ashong
text: The customer service lady was very nice. She gave me extra garlic sauce. She had my  order ready on time and the pizza taste soo good. This is definitely the best place to get pizza. The cookie dough was also good. I got it for my little sister but I ate some of it too. It taste better than the grocery store cookie dough.

name: Louise Berg
text: Order was to be done by 11:30 AM. We got there and tell opener forgot his keys said come back at 12:30 Iâ€™ll have your pizza is ready. It is now 1 oâ€™clock Iâ€™ve watched 12 pizzas leave and none of them are mine. I asked worker why didnâ€™t put â€¦More

name: Alexander Meyer
text: The place was not all that clean, there was frost all over the food (in the pic) the Canadian bacon had a sticker that said use by the 12th, it's the 16th.... Makes me wonder how fresh the rest of the items were, onions and tomatoes didn't â€¦More

text: Awesome pizza friendly service and they accept EBT.

name: Tread Life
text: Agree with reviews about the stingy toppings. Service was friendly and quick, but the elder one tried to make excuse for the obviously lacking toppings amount that left many glaring bare sauce areas. After I had to continue politely â€¦More

text: Best service ever. pizza melted in mouth.. Really loved the fresh stuffed pizza..

text: Went to papa's  Murphy's  for the $5  Friday , apparently it is now $9 dollar fridays , now adays we know 10 dollars gets you a nice pizza, sorry , but the thin crust was not worth the price. If I knew how bad they were gonna be, it would â€¦More

name: Christy Brewer
text: Since we no longer have a Papa Murphys in our neighborhood this was something my husband thought of as part of the road trip home rest stop route.I sure am glad he thought of stopping on our way home from visiting family in Paso Robles.The â€¦More

text: Great staff, friendly, helpful & on top of their game  - both pizza game & customer service game.

text: Its cheep, it's good and they get you out fast... Thank you will be back...

name: Scott Perry
text: Great pizza, nice owner, tremendous value !  It's on our 'regular list'

name: Marette Trimble
text: We've been going here for years and loved it.  With the new owners the pizzas not so great.  Less toppings, my family size was a large size not even the size of the pan it was on.  The crust was not right all gummy and flat.

name: Race S Williams
text: Great take home and bake pizza place it in the oven at 425 degrees and 12 mins later great pizza

name: Ariel Kim
text: Good quality pizza at reasonable price

name: Tosh L
text: So good out of YOUR own oven. Fresh, delicious and very reasonable prices.

name: Rhonda Clayton
text: Never been here before. Family said pizza was tasty. Staff seemed friendly.

name: Kevin Feusier
text: Always fresh ingredients and lots of affordable choices here. Great for groups or parties. Used to work here as a kid and the management of this now father daughter place is soooo much better!

name: Danny Kirby
text: I like Papa Murphy's, I order it often, especially when I can get a killer deal from one of the text offers I get from time to time. The pizza is always fresh and tastes great. Tho, review wise, I've only been to this location once. In this â€¦More

The pepperoni is so thin that you canâ€™t taste it. The crust seems gummy to chew. We drive 4 miles out of our way to patronize another papa Murphyâ€™s business.

text: I don't know any way it could better.they are hard working people everytime.

name: Dave Dooley
text: We have been coming here for years. We miss the old owner, Fred. But the new owners are really great too!

name: Michelle Hunter
text: So i went to this location somewhere i go frequently. My family and I LOVE these pizzas. I was there at 11am exactly when they open. I was excited because it was my first Sunday off in MONTHS. As i walked to the door the employee unlocked â€¦More
